findings: ✅ Uses 3-minute lookback window (end_time - 3 minutes) - NO look-forward bias
✅ Uses most recent bar close price for current price
✅ Uses oldest bar (2 minutes ago) for comparison - NO look-forward bias
✅ API timeout set to 5 seconds - reasonable for real-time execution
✅ Filter fails open on API errors - prevents blocking trades due to API issues
✅ Momentum threshold: 0.2% (20 basis points) - reasonable for 2-minute window
✅ Lookback window: 2 minutes - prevents stale signal entries
✅ Uses Professional SIP feed - best available data

potential_issues.impact: Signal detected at T=0, but price movement checked from T=-2min. If price moved between T=-2min and T=0, entry may be late.
potential_issues.recommendation: Consider shorter lookback (1 minute) or verify that 2 minutes is appropriate for signal latency

verdict.recommendation: Filter appears correct. 2-minute lookback prevents stale entries without causing excessive delay.
